thread.title: Great boutique hotel in terrific location
thread.title_full: Great boutique hotel in terrific location - Review of The Nadler Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Darren W
title: Great boutique hotel in terrific location
text: From the time I walked through the door to check in and was offered a cup of tea by Ataur to the time I checked out three days later my business stay at the Nader Victoria was beyond expectation. The staff are friendly and professional, the rooms cost and welcoming and the location is unbelievable. Highly recommended.
